hero.title: Building Smart Communities
hero.subtitle: Empowering communities through education, health, social engagement, and economic empowerment
hero.description: Shomajgori Foundation 2022 is dedicated to creating sustainable, smart communities that thrive through collective action and shared responsibility.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To build smart communities that are sustainable, inclusive, and empowered through education, health, social engagement, and economic empowerment. We believe that every community has the potential to thrive when equipped with the right tools, knowledge, and support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every community has the tools, knowledge, and support to create positive change and sustainable development. We envision communities that are self-reliant, innovative, and connected, where every individual can contribute to and benefit from collective progress.

Computer and internet access in community centers
Educational workshops and seminars on technology

health.title: Health & Wellness
health.description: Promoting physical and mental well-being through comprehensive health programs. We focus on preventive care, health education, and accessible healthcare services.
features: Mental health support and counseling services
Health education for families and children

modal.title: A Message from Our Founder
modal.content:
Over three decades ago, I left my home in Bangladesh to pursue a future in the United States. From my first job as a security guard to my retirement as a satellite engineer at Boeing, my life's journey has been one of perseverance, gratitude, and blessings.

Yet, no matter how far I traveled, my heart never left the soil of Vogdaburi—the village of my forefathers, where my earliest memories were formed. It is the place that shaped my roots, and it continues to call me back with a sense of belonging and responsibility.

The people of Bangladesh gave me a privilege that I have never forgotten: the chance to study in some of the best schools and colleges without ever paying tuition fees. That opportunity—made possible by the collective contributions of countless ordinary citizens—changed the course of my life. Today, as I look back, I feel a deep obligation to give something meaningful in return, not just to Vogdaburi, but to the nation that raised me.

My dream is simple yet profound: to create a smart and sustainable community model that harnesses the talents of people—their skills, their creativity, their collective strength. I believe lasting change does not come from charity alone, but from unlocking potential and building opportunities.

Vogdaburi, where my family's story began, will be the starting point of this vision. My hope is that what we build here can serve as a model for other communities across Bangladesh—communities where education, healthcare, social responsibility, and economic empowerment can work hand in hand to create dignity and self-reliance for all.

This is not just about one village. It is about honoring the gift I once received from my country, by giving back in a way that is sustainable, empowering, and filled with hope.

With gratitude and faith in the future.
modal.signature:
Mohammad Zakir Hossain
Founder & President, Shomajgori Foundation
